promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong lynx normal-type pokemon wearing a opal crown. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opalixar, a a gigantic strong lynx normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Razor Wing. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "normal" or "Opalixar". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, lynx-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: An elusive giant, this beast roams open fields, its Razor Wing cutting through the wind. Its strength is as legend among wild Pokémon.
